pageContext.claim: “And coming into the last month I thought we were going to win. We were getting massive crowds. My opponent was not getting good crowds at all.She was getting, you know, singers and entertainers to fill up the stadiums. They'd finish singing and then everybody would leave and she was left there.”
pageContext.analysis: This is nonsense. Going into the last month of the campaign, all polls suggested that Hillary Clinton was going to win. According to an ABC analysis of the how the candidates spent their time, Trump did have more and larger rallies than Clinton, but she was never "left there alone."
